document.title: Eiffel Envision Class View
document.paragraph:
EiffelEnvision projects also provide a compiled representation of the project(s) via the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxoriviewingclassestheirmembers.htmClass View. This view will be familiar to users approaching EiffelEnvision having used ../../eiffelenvision_for_eiffelstudio_developers/index.xmlEiffelStudio in the past. EiffelEnvision extends the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfClassViewWindow.htmClass View to provide context-specific information on ancestors and decedents of classes and features.
in_this_section2In This Sectionhierarchy.xmlAn Overview of the Class View Hierarchy An overview of the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfClassViewWindow.htmClass View window, augmenting the Visual Studio .NET documentation. clusters.xmlClass View and Object Browser Clusters Documentation on the Class View and Object Browser cluster nodes. classes.xmlClass View and Object Browser Classes Documentation on the Class View and Object Browser class nodes. features.xmlClass View and Object Browser Features Documentation on the Class View and Object Browser feature nodes. also_see2Related SectionsSee Also:../object_browser/index.xmlObject Browser../icon_glossary.xmlClass View and Object Browser Icons
